attributes.name: aEditor
attributes.comment: is the instance of the JSON editor developed by Jeremy Dorn

attributes.name: aName
attributes.comment: the attribute 'aName' stores the base name of the JSON file. it used for base name for export files.

attributes.name: aData
attributes.comment: the attribute 'aData' is a array of JSON records that are edited with the JSON editor by Jeremy Dorn

attributes.name: current
attributes.comment: the attribute 'current' stores the current selected index in the array, -1 means no JSON record selected in array or array is empty

attributes.name: aSchemaJSON
attributes.comment: the attribute 'aSchemaJSON' stores in JSON schema that defines the structure of JSON records in the array

attributes.name: aEditURL
attributes.comment: the attribute 'aEditURL' stores the URL to the JSON Editor developed by Jeremy Dorn

attributes.name: aDOMID
attributes.comment: the attribute 'aDOMID' stores in ids of DOM element, e.g. editor_holder, valid ...

methods.name: init
methods.comment:
(1)pDOMID is hash with DOM ids that contains the following key/value pairs
 - "name" is the name of JSON database that is used for the exported filename for JSON
 - "editor" the DOM element where the JSON editor is injected (editor_holder of JSON editor).
 - "validator" is the DOM element to "valid" or "not valid" to (innerHTML) used in updateDOM()
 - "current" is the DOM element to write the currently selected array index into a text input box (value) used in updateDOM()
 - "length" is the DOM element to write the current array length to (innerHTML) used in updateDOM()
(2) pData is the large array that is edited and 
(3) pSchema defines the JSON schema of a single record in the large thisarray

methods.name: prev
methods.comment: goto previous record

methods.name: next
methods.comment: Goto next record

methods.name: goto
methods.comment: goto record with index i, i is determined by an input string set by the user with an onchange event.

methods.name: first
methods.comment: shows the first element in the large record

methods.name: last
methods.comment: goes to the last record in large array

methods.name: edit
methods.comment: edit calls the JSON editor of Jeremy Dorn for the selected record. It sets the init value of the JSON editor.

methods.name: setSchema
methods.comment: setSchema() sets a new schema for the JSON editor and the records of the array. If the editor this.aEditor exists, setSchema will destroy the current JSON editor to free some resources otherwise it will call the init method again.

methods.name: getSchema
methods.code: return this.aSchemaJSON;
methods.comment: getSchema() just return the JSON schema this.aSchemaJSON

methods.name: export
methods.comment: export() uses the FileSaver.js to create a download of exported JSON pJSON after the JSON was stringified

methods.name: exportData
methods.code: this.export(this.aName+".json",this.aData)
methods.comment: exportData() exports the JSON data in this.aData as file. The filename is defined by this.aName. if aName="myjson" the filename is "myjson.json"

methods.name: exportSchema
methods.code: this.export(this.aName+"_schema.json",this.aSchemaJSON)
methods.comment: exportSchema() exports the JSON schema in this.aSchemaJSON as file. The filename is defined by this.aName. if aName="myjson" the filename is "myjson_schema.json"

methods.name: getLocalStorageID4Name
methods.code: return pName.replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9]/g,"_");
methods.comment: the LocalStorageID for an item may not contain a dot . Name

methods.name: loadLS
methods.comment: loadLS() loads the JSON file from Local Storage

methods.name: saveLS
methods.comment: saveLS() stores the JSON file in Local Storage

methods.name: validate
methods.comment:
validates the current record in the large array against the schema. 
Returns true if record in JSON editor valid according to the JSON schema in this.aSchemaJSON

methods.name: onChange
methods.comment: handle onChange event from the JSON editor developed by Jeremy Dorn. This method updates the content in the editor with the record in this.aData[this.current]

methods.name: deleteRecord
methods.comment: delete current record in array and decrease current if is the last

methods.name: deleteAsk
methods.comment: deleteAsk() asks the user if deleteRecord() should be performed

methods.name: check
methods.comment: checks if the index of the array is between 0 and this.aData.lenth

methods.name: updateDOM
methods.comment: updateDOM() updates the index of the currently edited record from the array and updates the length of the array e.g. if a new record was pushed the array this.aData

methods.name: setEditorData
methods.comment: setEditorData() sets the Editor with current, data and schema

methods.name: getEditorData
methods.comment: getEditorData() create a Hash for this.current, this.aData and this.aSchema

methods.name: load
methods.comment: loads the file from Local Storage and updates the DOM values with current, aData loadLS() and load() cannot be merged because loadLS() is called in the this.init() without the possibility to edit() due to the fact that the JSON editor is not created and dependent on the loaded values of the schema

methods.name: save
methods.code:
this.saveLS();
  this.exportData();
methods.comment: save() stores current index, JSON data and JSON schema with storeLS() into local storage and exports the current JSON data as file

methods.name: add
methods.comment: add() appends a new record at the end of the array

methods.name: importJSON
methods.comment: importJSON() parses the JSON string in pStringJSON and stores the JSON in this.aData
